name: Vers le rang S
description:
You will live the adventure of a young hero who becomes an adventurer in a world full of monsters. You start as a rank E adventurer and your goal is to become a legend: a rank S adventurer. In order to achieve this, you will have to successfully complete all kinds of quests and missions.

You'll find different quests from the most mundane to the hardest. There are also plenty of hidden quests and elements.

More to come:

  • More quests
  • More places to explore
  • New characters

This version is really the beginning of the game. There's not much for the moment but some new features will arrive very soon. Being a French creator the game is in French but also in English.

To support me you can become a patron of the game: Nemeon.

The game is still under development and may contain bugs. If you have any suggestions to improve the game, don't hesitate to leave them as a comment. Feel free to share the game around you.
